column5: Im, only fishing on the weekends. After all i got school and all, and nothing but chores during the week.
Work, work, dream of fishing, work, and pick something up for the misses (mother's day gift).

Worked this AM,Now going to fix the BBQ,then Im sure it will be dinner time,then it will ne nascar time which means Miller time. Just no time to fish.LOL  Sure is a beauty of a day though. Memart is out on his first boat ride with the new ride.

Strep throat  Had it all week, had to work, it was a rough week.  Just barely coming around now with the meds.  Cleaned the house tho, between sniffles and coughs.  Entertaining Mom for Mother's day tomorrow so I had to, otherwise I'd be in bed  Joey

Cuz' I bought a Johnson  No matter what I do, or how I do it, store it, fog it, don't fog it, pay to have it done, store it indoors one season, outdoors one season...it don't matter. I've been working on the thing for 4 hours today. The first time of the year that I go to fire it up it's a royal pain in the butt. Then she runs great all season  I think it's time to unload it. Before I burn it.   Hookset.
Isnt that Pauls job J Hope you feel better soon .

~~~~Quite simple, I don't drive, got the boat, and trailer, but need partner with a vehicle to tow it, and the partner I have now got himself a job, and has bought his own boat.But I'll be out on Sunday, 2 of the 2 days of the long weekend

just got off work to lazy to go get the boat and put it in.tommorrows mothers day so thats out of the question.next weekend cant fish either but leaving for a solid week of pike and walleye in the great north im itchin.

all the self-admitted lazy folk seem to come out later in the day    Only 2.5 hours of work left... but too many hours too count before I can wet a line...still gotta drive home, pack, drive north, kiss mom, throw the canoe on the truck so it's ready for the morning and MAYBE fish before breakfast.  Or make mom breakfast, then go to church THEN fish for the afternoon.  but I'm whistlin' while I work, and the day's almost over.

LOL Phil, my son and his girlfriend are near there today, the school gathering at Cedar Point after yesterday`s prom night. Grand kids spent the night cause my wife doesn`t work till tomorrow evening.  Don`t know if Joe could carry the tackle bag with out you and Deg to help, I haven`t down sized yet. Just one of those days where I am better off inside. A very long drive for me and hard to get motivated to fish for walleyes, especially on Lake Erie.

worked at the shop this morning from 730 - 1200 helped some friends move after that just home now to shower/change before i go and work my 2nd job from 5 until 9    good thing i plan on getting rid of the delivery job...or i'd never get out! (i made that mistake last summer)  ryan
Dang! sorry to hear that ehg, walking isn`t a strong point for me either.

play date with friends and there kids.  Nap with my 2 year old.  having dinner in a few and then a 2 hour walk to end the day with the the little man.  Its not fishing but it sure is fun hanging with the little one!  My opening will happen in a couple weeks so Im pumped!  Cheers!
My excuse is i'm going fishing tomorrow.

I too just got in the house after getting the boat ready most of the day. Like Roy, mine,s a 60 HP Merc 4 stroke. Mine is a 2001 though and it came with a steering wheel. You'll love it Roy. Mine started today after cranking for about half a second. And it hasn't been started since last September. Anyways I changed some fluids, lubed things up, and installed a 12 volt plug in. I bought a nice little power inverter a while ago that will come in handy. It also has a USB connection so that I can run my GPS, cell phone and MP3 player in the boat. Nice. I'm looking so forward to next weekend...

I am not fishing right now because I am all tuckered out from fishing all afternoon..... I went into work at 5AM got done at 7:30 AM no OPP around LOL Did the grocery shopping on the way home. Watched F1 qualifying. Laughed when my dad stopped by to help my neighbour fix his car just after 9AM cause they couldn't come fishing.  Stopped by the big dam in town to get minnows it was hard slogging to get two dozen. After the attractant worked I finally caught some beauties though. However I got a parking ticket because it took so long. I got back to the car just as he was leaving the ticket and it was just 25 minutes till you didn't have to pay as well, but people were lining up for spots so I can't really complain. He said that is too bad too that I wasn't just a bit quicker the meter had just turned when he got done the car beside me sooooooo he had no choice (yeah right).... For the eight bucks for the ticket I could have bought the minnows and been fishing earlier geessshhh.  So I got 3 pike and now they are off the list for this year which is good. I forgot my hair rigs so I didn't even attempt going after carp, but I did catch a couple dozen catfish. Who seemed to enjoy the minnows more than the pike. I even caught 3 catfish on a silver spoon and that is caught like in the mouth and everything. I did accidently also snag 2 catfish too, they are attacking anything that comes near their small fry with a vengence.
I'm just resting up so that I'm ready for the next 200 days !
Just got home from work and I head back out tomorrow morning at 5:30am or so for another day of fun and excitement in the tunnels  Maureen
Just finished re-wiring boat for new fish finders.  Ready for the whole season now....
I'm too tired to go now! Besides I just got back

Well just recently finished renovateing my whole kitchen.  That took allmost two months.  Have also painted all my down stairs basement & two bedrooms.  Ripped out all the old carpet waiting for the new carpet to come and be laid.   Just put up a new very lrg above ground pool , next week start work on building the new cedar deck for the pool .  I have been so busy have really not had alot of time to fish which is not like me at all......In four weeks i will have 70+ people here at my place for my grandparents 60th wedding anniversary. My folks will also be here from the UK as well as one of my younger sisters who i have not seen in allmost eight yrs now.  Over 30 relatives coming frome Europe so this really is a big deal.  My grandady will be 81 this june my nan will be 79.  So this may be the very last time we have everyone togeather with my nan and paps.  So i will be crazy busy for the next few weeks also as i am trying to do all this on my few days off i have a week.  Any volunteers would be greatly appreciated .......lol  Joey hope your feeling better soon hun.
the ice isn't gone!!!!!!!

....I'd love to be out there, somewhere. But alas yesterday was a working day, the one that pays the bills. Today I'm assembling rod handles and wrapping rod guides (pays for my fishing gear & trips, sort'a). Three more shifts and I'll be on holidays, should be able to get out fishing then.
Season starts next weeknd thats if the ice is off the lakes
Hooked up with a few other guys on bikes Saturday............
I am stuck at work on this glorious morning....if you are reading this, then I ask you:  what's got you stuck in front of your computer?

I need to put the finishing touches on my boat and wire up a new trailering harness to the truck, Install a roof vent for a neighbour and trim out a basement....  Ohhh and take the winter tires off the car...  It is gonna be a long day.......   G
I got a new 4 stoke last night and I thought it would be a nice touch if I just hung around the house today doing garden work and boiling up the lobsters that were on special this morning.
Roy, you picked up a new motor? What did you get?  Mmmmm Lobster....  G

i also got a new (to me) 3.6 merc off ebay i need to try out today, hopefully its as sound as the guy said, but too cheap to pass up.  later gonna take the wife and my parents out for a double birthday/double mothers day dinner.  jason
here in NW Ontario our season opens next weekend. besides that our lakes are still ice bound. it will be a miracle if they are open for the opening of walleye season.
Gerritt, I got a 60hp 4 stroke Mercury (tiller  ) and a 70 lb Minn-Kota Edge 24V. I'm happy as a pig in poop. They'll install it/them on the 20th.

Dang Roy lobster sounds great   , I'm in the kitchen myself this am nursing a pot of sauce and making some homemade meat balls. After it's done tomorrow it's going in the freezer so I can't take with next week to feed a few hungry fisherman.
Multiple Sclerosis
That should push your ride around nicely Roy! Congrats !  G  TILLER!

Wife's car had to be towed into our mechanic's service center last evening and she will need the wagon to get to the community yard sale in town later...Too far to walk over to the "Manor"...maybe after supper...  I still have some work to do on the "Tin" and a bit of carpentry work on the dock...(build a new and longer gang plank as the ice moved it out a foot or so)...and replace three "spongy" 2x4's on the back section...Oh ya...Make three new steps out back for the porch...getting the old ones off will prob take me all day...LOL  Dang...they never taught us any of this stuff in accounting...
went fishing last night.  Today:  1) lawn, garden...work work work 2) baby mooma's first mothers day  : 3) baby  forrest

Pouring down rain and has been raining all morning. My grand-daughter plays T-ball  Miracle League Network and her first game is this afternoon.  Ain't gonna miss that.  This league was formed last year and lets young kids with disabilities play 3 innings of T-bal.  Everyone on the team bats each inning, everyone scores, and the last person up in the inning always hits a home run.  Game ends in a tie.  Sure is inspiring to see kids with a variety of disabilities, including wheel chairs, breathing machines, etc. play and have a great time.  Ani't gonna miss it .... if the rain stops.  Today ... I have a good excuse.
Umm... likewise! I figure after 10 hrs. sleep and a good nutritious breakfast, i'll try the Toronto islands for pike now. Can't walk far, however.  At least i can still do fishing. ehg
Well all these great excuses sure are helping the time go by quickly at work That and secretly printing  maps off the Atlas of Canada site...
Paul jump in the van and head to Joe's, they haven't left the dock yet I wasn't there to motivate them  Rough night I suppose
Season is not open here other than the stocked trout ponds which I may hit this afternoon.

Mow lawns, Whip up something in the crock pot, Do laundry, Sweep and Mop floors Dust, Cut wood for fire tonight, Run to Beer store, Balance Books, Post here, and then...  Grab a rod and some minnows and I am outta here for a couple of hours...  Back to the job list so I can have those few moments of peace and tranquilty teasing (not exactly catching) fish... if one does wind up on my lap I will be sure to tell the world about it later... lol  Have a great day everyone...  Cheers,  Jen
The Warden (Wife) did not approve my probation
Hung over, and don't really care to deal with the traffic of weekend warriors..
I'm actually looking for someone to go with ha.
I'm gonna be Ol' Yellers shopping slave in a little bit... plus she'll really kick my  if I leave her sight without permission
well, maybe you can play drop the soap at shower time.....
i was working till now who wants to go fishing
Hers my list:  And to those that went fishing today I'm going to be jealous at about 5:05 this afternoon just after I punch   in and head down the stairs. Hope you had a good day!
